CustomField.formula:
IF( Grantee_Contact_2__r.Phone <> null,
'('& MID( (SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( ( Grantee_Contact_2__r.Phone ) , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), ".", "")) ,1, 3) &') '& MID( (SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( ( Grantee_Contact_2__r.Phone ) , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), ".", "")) ,4,3)&'-'& MID( ( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( ( Grantee_Contact_2__r.Phone ) , "(", ""), ")", ""), " ", ""), "-", ""), ".", "")) ,7,4) , "")
CustomField.label: Secondary Contact Phone
